scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm start --prefix client"
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:https: cd server && set HTTPS_PORT=5443 && npm start
scripts.init:capacitor: cd client && npx cap init CipherNest com.ciphernest.vault
scripts.build:android: cd client && npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.build:ios: cd client && npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open ios
